headline: Notification of temporary website shutdown
message: On Friday, May 10th, Sasquatch would be unavailable between 08:45 and 09:00 AM GMT approx., while we release new features.
longMessage: Due to new application code, Sasquatch could be temporarily inaccessible on the schedule indicated below. We are very sorry for the inconvenience it may cause, but we sincerely appreciate your understanding.
